title: Is it okay for me, a white person, to write about a black character experiencing racism? I have black friends helping me co-write, but I don't want to tell a story that's not mine to tell. - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write what you want, however some may not feel that it's authentic; however as you said that you have black friends to help you write which could help. Especially when it comes to unintentional stereotyping. My issue is though that if people can only write what they know, then a majority of stories will only feature writers doing writer things. No more sci-fi, horror or cop stories. Write what you want to write, as long as you don't offend to many people; as you'll always find someone to be offended.
